description:
Jou has the Firebomb NOTE - the ability to freely manipulate flames. His G-suit releases vapors all over his body for cooling when he is emitting flames. He fights with flame shuriken, volleys of fireballs from both arms, and other forms of flame attacks. He can even fly by emitting flames from his hands and feet.
Source: ANN
name: Hibiki Jou (G Suit)
